name: Pirate Attack!
description:
Pirates have you surrounded and are closing in!  Each turn you have two options: sail one league in any direction, or stay where you are and fire your cannons.  Your cannons reach three leagues, they fire on both sides of your ship and will destroy the first pirate within range.  The pirates will chase your mercilessly but with no care for themselves or each other, so with cunning and careful planning you should be able to outwit them. Good luck!

  • Number of puzzles: 55
  • Average play time: 2h
  • First published: October 2021 (exclusive to itch.io)
  • Inspired by: Seven Seas by PopCap games (2001)
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to plan your move. SPACE or [X] to action; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

Explore more of Erich's puzzles at: Puzzle Palace   
See also: The Erich Friedman puzzle collection - by pedroPSI

With thanks to members of the thinky-puzzle-games discord for play-testing and to Matthieu Haller  for help with the puzzlescript.
